item.description:
Hi all,

Group member John who has attended this festival before and who got things rolling for this event thinks its a good idea to purchase tickets ahead of time. The website for the festival is here http://themusichall.o... and to purchase tickets, press the buy tickets button in the top left hand corner.

As mentioned on the group's message boad we are trying to get an impromptu road trip to the Telluride on the Sea Film Festival in Portsmouth, NH. Due to scheduling problems, perhaps the best film of the festival, Persepolis, is screening at 9 am and so as nutty as it sounds, we are hoping to make it there for both this andThe Diving Bell and the Butterfly at 2 pm

PERSEPOLIS ***** ( 5 Stars from Eyeweekly)

Quite simply one of the best book adaptations and animated films to have come out of Europe in recent years, Marjane Satrapi and Vincent Paronnaud?s Persepolis is a film experience one is unlikely to forget. The film won a shared Grand Prix at the recent Cannes Film Festival European Films.Net

THE DIVING BELL AND THE BUTTERFLY
As close to perfection as you'll get for a movie dealing with a subject matter that might seem impossible to handle in an entertaining way. ComingSoon.net

We would meet at The Friendly Toast (A Phantom Gourmet "Hidden Jewel") right across from The Music Hall for breakfast and lunch, and explore Portsmouth between the films. http://www.mrbreakfas...

People can try to set up car-pools on the group's message board. Here's a link to directions to The Music Hall: http://www.mapquest.c...

Could be fun and should prove adventurous. Please include in the comment field what movie(s) you will attend and if you need a ride, if so hopefully people can agree where to meet to carpool.
Full reviews THE DIVING BELL AND THE BUTTERFLY: http://www.variety.co...
PERSEPOLIS: http://www.cinematica...

So far through the message board we've had a few people interested, perhaps we'll have a few more
item.name: Telluride On The Sea Festival and Road Trip
